name: B U N N Y
description:
They say that art is part of us, this is part of me now, nature represented by a 3d rabbit, the noise in the images is my body moving, I used some linear vectors with Isadora Troikatronics and some color games with Touchdesigner. I feel that this rabbit is me, finding myself in every color, line and noise that I can feel, these background figures represent my thoughts and I do not know if I am managing to make clear who I am, but I like the result.

This is our first piece of the #NFTDairyMLT
